name: Network Access Associates Ltd (OneWeb)
goal: To develop and launch a constellation of low orbiting satellites for the provision of high speed and latency broadband access to rural and remote communities of the world. OneWeb aims to start operations in 2020, connect all unconnected schools of the world by 2022 and bridge the digital divide of the world by 2027.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Development, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Space and spectrum policies
- Broadband connectivity policies
